tags.name: person-testimonial
tags.description:
`person-testimonial`

Attributes:

  * `described-by` {`string`} - Aria-describedby data passed down to appropriate tag

  * `image` {`string`} - The profile image to display to the left of the quote.

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the person making the quote.

  * `position` {`string`} - The title / position of the person in question.

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `describedBy` {`string`} - Aria-describedby data passed down to appropriate tag

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the person making the quote.

  * `position` {`string`} - The title / position of the person in question.

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -
